summary: I'm a dynamic Sales Manager with excellent cross-cultural communication and time-management skills. A natural born team player and fast learner, I thrive with ownership in a fast-paced environment. With expertise in Communication and Marketing, in the last years I sought to get a deep understanding of B2B relationships, Finance Operations and Sales. I am also passionate about CrossFit and traveled to 50+ countries.
